passages.text:
You stand on a road covered by dirt, vines and time. The road forks off into four directions. Each path has a temple at its destination. Each temple is made of its own material.

[[Go Path One->Obsidian Temple]]
[[Go Path Two-> Sea Glass Temple]]
[[Go Path Three->Metal Temple]]
[[Go Path Four->Marble Temple]]
passages.name: Fork

passages.text:
You approach the temple. On the outside it is very dark and hard. You touch it and it feels warm. There is a symbol on the outside of the building. It looks like an all consuming fire destroying the world

[[Go Left-> Sea Glass Temple]]
[[Go Right->Metal Temple]]
[[Go Forward->Marble Temple]]
[[Go Inside-> Fire Lake]]
passages.name: Obsidian Temple

passages.text:
You approach the building. It is an absolutely gorgeous temple, made out of colorful glass. You can see right through and see what appears to be a beach with an ocean that should not fit inside the building. There is a symbol on the side of the building that looks like a depiction of a massive flood.

[[Go Right->Obsidian Temple]]
[[Go Left->Metal Temple]]
[[Go Forward->Marble Temple]]
[[Go Inside -> Endless Ocean]]
passages.name: Sea Glass Temple

passages.text:
You approach the metal temple. The metal is scuffed and worn from years of use. Some parts seem newer than others, almost as if this temple had been around for a long time and people kept adding to it. On the side of the building there is a symbol. It looks as if the Earth has been split into four pieces. You touch the building and feel that it is vibrating.

[[Go Left-> Sea Glass Temple]]
[[Go Right->Obsidian Temple]]
[[Go Forward->Marble Temple]]
[[Go Inside-> The Cave]]
passages.name: Metal Temple

passages.text:
You approach the Marble Temple. Something about this one feels different to you. It is a place that makes you feel strange in your core. There is a symbol on the side of the building. It is a gigantic storm.


[[Go Left->Obsidian Temple]]
[[Go Right-> Sea Glass Temple]]
[[Go Backward->Metal Temple]]
[[Go Inside -> The Storm]]
passages.name: Marble Temple

passages.text:
Inside of the obsidian temple is a lake made of fire. You do not understand this, as the fire fills the lake like water. You try to get closer but it is very hot.

[[Go outside->Obsidian Temple]]
passages.name: Fire Lake

passages.text:
You walk inside the temple. From the outside the beach looked sunny and serene, but as you walk in you feel the coldness from the water sapping away your body heat. You look up but all you can see is pitch black. Before you is the ocean you saw earlier. It is very dark and you can't see an end. Using reason, you stay away from walking inside the ocean.

[[Go Outside-> Sea Glass Temple]]
passages.name: Endless Ocean

passages.text:
Inside of the temple you find yourself standing in front of a massive cave enterance. The cave appears to slope deeply in the Earth. You can see a light coming from somewhere inside. As you get closer you realize something in the cave is violently shaking. You can't say for sure, but it feels like it wants to escape. Knowing that "thing" is in there you decide not to go any deeper.

[[Go Outside ->Metal Temple]]
passages.name: The Cave

passages.text:
When you walk inside the building, you dont see anything unusual. Just a very large room. Something inside of you grows weary and you decide not to take any more steps. Instead, you pick up some of the dirt you drragged in and throw it in front of you. It begins to fall upwards. When you look where it goes there is a gigantic swirling storm above you. Not wanting to be a part of that, you decide not to step any further.

[[Go Outside->Marble Temple]]
passages.name: The Storm
